1.9.1.9-0.2: Fixed dedicated server crash bug and update to latest forge.
1.9.1.9-0.3: More work on dedicated server crash bug and start work on holiday item system.
1.9.1.9-0.4: Fixes for more bugs, continuing work on holiday item system, and some rendering tweaks.
1.9.1.9-0.5: Fix cauldron bottle fill tweak and bump forge version.
1.9.1.9-0.6: Rework config system and bump forge version for ore dictionary tweaks.
1.9.1.9-1.0.1: Change to latest forge mappings and add NBT respecting recipes with JEI support.

1.9.4.1.9.4-1.0: First release for 1.9.4. Fixes config value clamping crash bug.

1.10.2.1.10.2-1.1: Fix a bug where clicking a cauldron with an empty hand crashes the game.
1.10.2.1.10.2-1.2: Fix a bug where commands with zero arguments would not give usages and fix a possible terrain discontinuity bug when pregenerating.
1.10.2.1.10.2-1.3: Add a config for the dragon drop and try once again to make pregening work better.
1.10.2.1.10.2-1.4: Add /mde tpa and make /tpa, /tpx, and /tps register as base level commands if none exist at startup. Rewrite the base commmand system to prevent cross-mod subcommand sharing, requires mod updates.
1.10.2.1.10.2-1.4.1: Attempt to fix the AbstractMethodError caused by moving the /tp* commands to base level commands
1.10.2.1.10.2-1.4.2: More work on the AbstractMethodError introduced in 1.10.2-1.4
1.10.2.1.10.2-1.5: Fix the bugs. Last release for 1.10.2
